subject: Not connecting
description_text:
Hello, my Simpson pedals are not connecting. They were connected and then all of a sudden now they won’t connect at all. I have the update Sim manager 2.1.0.
Sent from Lewis’s iPhone

conversations.body_text: Hi Marvin Brooks,    Please connect the USB cable directly to the blue USB 3.0 port on the back of your computer and avoid using a USB hub. In addition, kindly provide us with your order number and pedal model so that we can assist you with manually restoring the firmware.
